articles.title: Healey proposes eliminating statute of limitations for rape when DNA evidence exists
articles.description:
The current statute of limitations in Massachusetts is the third most strict deadline in the country at 15 years.

The post Healey proposes eliminating statute of limitations for rape when DNA evidence exists appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Healey proposes eliminating the 15-year statute of limitations for rape cases with DNA evidence.
Massachusetts currently has the third strictest statute of limitations in the U.S.
This change could provide justice for survivors by allowing prosecution regardless of time elapsed.

articles.title: Watch: Patriots share hype video ahead of Super Bowl LX
articles.description:
The post reads: "ONE MORE TIME FOR THE WARRIORS."

The post Watch: Patriots share hype video ahead of Super Bowl LX appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Patriots released a hype video for Super Bowl LX on February 8, 2026.
Video features key players like Mike Vrabel and Stefon Diggs.
Local fans rally around the team's spirit as they prepare for the championship.
